00036 #ifndef PACC_SIGNALHANDLER_HPP
00037 #define PACC_SIGNALHANDLER_HPP
00038 
00039 #include <stack>
00040 #include <signal.h>
00041 
00042 namespace PACC {
00043     
00044     using namespace std;
00045     
00074     class SignalHandler {
00075      public:
00077         enum SignalType {
00078             eSigAbrt=0,  
00079             eSigFPE,     
00080             eSigIll,     
00081             eSigInt,     
00082             eSigSegV,    
00083             eSigTerm,    
00084             eSigAlrm,    
00085             eSigChld,    
00086             eSigCont,    
00087             eSigHUp,     
00088             eSigKill,    
00089             eSigPipe,    
00090             eSigQuit,    
00091             eSigStop,    
00092             eSigTStp,    
00093             eSigTrap,    
00094             eSigTTin,    
00095             eSigTTou,    
00096             eSigUsr1,    
00097             eSigUsr2,    
00098             NSIGNALS
00099         };
00100         
00102         SignalHandler(void) {}
00103         
00105         virtual ~SignalHandler(void) {}
00106         
00113         virtual void main(SignalType inType) = 0;
00114         
00116         static void popAction(SignalType inType);
00117         
00119         static void pushAction(SignalType inType);
00120         
00122         void setCustomAction(SignalType inType);
00123         
00125         static void setDefaultAction(SignalType inType);
00126         
00128         static void setIgnoreAction(SignalType inType);
00129         
00130      protected:     
00132         static SignalType convertFromNativeSignal(int inNativeNumber);
00133         
00135         static int convertToNativeSignal(SignalType inType);
00136         
00137      private:
00139         typedef void (*HandlerPointer) (int);           
00140 
00142         struct Action {
00143             SignalHandler* mHandler;
00144             HandlerPointer mFunc;
00145             Action(SignalHandler* inHandler, HandlerPointer inFunc) : mHandler(inHandler), mFunc(inFunc) {}
00146         };
00147         
00148         static stack<Action> smActions[NSIGNALS]; 
00149         
00151         static void runAction(int inSignal);
00152     };
